main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Naha, Okinawa on 8 October 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and moving swiftly, sometimes appearing elliptical in shape and about 50 to 60 feet in diameter., Multiple witnesses, including military personnel, reported the object over a span of 10-15 minutes., The object exhibited erratic flight patterns, including abrupt altitude and direction changes., The sighting included both visual and radar tracking of the object., No physical evidence was identified at the scene following extensive investigation.
witness description: military personnel and a civilian employee
